name: Broccoli Cheese Bites
author: REBECCA B.
summary: These cheesy, deep fried broccoli snacks are so tasty, and great for parties. Everyone loves them.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package chopped frozen broccoli, thawed and drained
directions: Heat oil in deep-fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Place broccoli in a medium saucepan with 1 cup boiling water
Cook covered until firm but tender, about 5 minutes
In a medium saucepan over low heat, melt the Cheddar cheese
Allow the mixture to cool and thicken approximately 15 minutes
In a medium bowl, mix the bread crumbs, salt and pepper
Spread the mixture onto a large piece of wax paper
Form the broccoli cheese mixture into balls and roll in the bread crumb mixture until thoroughly coated
Deep fry the balls until golden brown, about 5 minutes
